statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); rel_dir=$(echo "${current_dir#$project_dir}"); if [[ "$rel_dir" == "$current_dir" ]]; then rel_dir="~${current_dir#$HOME}"; else rel_dir="${rel_dir#/}"; fi; printf "\033[2m\033[38;2;137;180;250m%s\033[0m \033[2m\033[38;2;166;227;161min\033[0m \033[2m\033[38;2;203;166;247m%s\033[0m \033[2m\033[38;2;148;226;213m[%s]\033[0m" "$model" "${rel_dir:-./}" "$output_style"
